content.question: In the short run, which of the following is true of a firm's average total cost of production?

choices.label: It is equal to marginal cost plus average variable cost.
It is equal to marginal cost plus average fixed cost.
It is equal to average fixed cost plus average variable cost.
It always increases when a firm increases production.
It is zero if the firm shuts down.

content.answer: It is equal to average fixed cost plus average variable cost.
